title: Skript如何判断attacker是否在victim的后面？
txt_content:
我的想法：
如果攻击者在受伤者的背后，杀死受伤者
但是这么写无法识别：
if the attacker is bihind the victim:
        kill the victim复制代码

replies.txt_content:
a6809936 发表于 2017-5-5 22:22
“在背后”，怎样算在背后呢……把设置里视角拉到最宽的时候能看到前方180°范围的物体，正常是70°，这里 ...
on damage:
        attacker is player
        message "§9%victim%§f: %location of victim%, %victim's yaw%, %victim's pitch%" to attacker
        message "§9%attacker%§f: %location of attacker%, %attacker's yaw%, %attacker's pitch%" to attacker
        
        message "score: §4%victim's yaw - attacker's yaw%" to attacker
        victim's yaw - attacker's yaw is not between 35 and 325
        victim's yaw - attacker's yaw is not between -325 and -35
        # 注：360 - 35 = 325
        
        kill victim
        message "§csuccess" to attacker
咳咳，修一下bug，忘记小值减大值会出现负数了，在判定方向那里应该再加上一行判定差值为负的情况……

“在背后”，怎样算在背后呢……把设置里视角拉到最宽的时候能看到前方180°范围的物体，正常是70°，这里按70°算吧
例子里确实没这类的可供参考，不过官方文档里是有的……
在 http://njol.ch/projects/skript/doc/expressions/#ExprYawPitch 里面有个例子
log "%player%: %location of player%, %player's yaw%, %player's pitch%" to "playerlocs.log"这里需要判断有关被攻击者的面部朝向yaw值，于是我们可以改造一下，得到下面的产物，调试的时候可以/summon Giant召唤一只不会动的巨人来打打，感觉判断范围太宽了就调一下吧……
on damage:
    attacker is player
    message "§9%victim%§f: %location of victim%, %victim's yaw%, %victim's pitch%" to attacker
    message "§9%attacker%§f: %location of attacker%, %attacker's yaw%, %attacker's pitch%" to attacker
    
    message "score: §4%victim's yaw - attacker's yaw%" to attacker
    victim's yaw - attacker's yaw is not between 35 and 325
    # 注：360 - 35 = 325
    
    kill victim
    message "§csuccess" to attacker
